```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.optimize import rosen
>>> X = 0.1 * np.arange(10)
>>> rosen(X)
76.56 
```

```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> from mpl_toolkits.mplot3d import Axes3D
>>> x = np.linspace(-1, 1, 50)
>>> X, Y = np.meshgrid(x, x)
>>> ax = plt.subplot(111, projection='3d')
>>> ax.plot_surface(X, Y, rosen([X, Y]))
>>> plt.show() 
```
